ygData.subject: Another new member of list
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, my fine brethern in song!  I am Linako LindenLyre (also known as Linako the Unlucky, Linako the Mob Magnet, Lizard Lunch Linako, or Linako the
ygData.messageBody:
Hello, my fine brethern in song! I am Linako LindenLyre (also known as Linako the Unlucky, Linako the Mob Magnet, Lizard Lunch Linako, or Linako the Disposable Bard), a bard of the 32d verse on the server known as Mithaniel Marr.

And yes, there's a story behind each of those aka's. =)

I look forward to exchanging information, stories, or just passing the time of day with everyone here.

(And if I'm lucky, passing my bad luck on to someone else.) =)

Linako LindenLyre
<no current guild affiliation>
